dct_title_s: Reconnoissance map of the United States showing the distribution of the geologic system so far as known
dct_description_sm: compiled from data in possession of the U.S. Geological Survey by W.J. McGee, 1893.
In upper border: U.S. Geological Survey. Fourteenth annual report, pl. II.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
